channel.title: CVE Feed for pillarjs -- send
channel.description: The latest CVEs for pillarjs -- send

item.title: CVE-2024-43799|2024-09-10T14:45:06.761Z -- pillarjs -- send
item.description: Send is a library for streaming files from the file system as a http response. Send passes untrusted user input to SendStream.redirect() which executes untrusted code. This issue is patched in send 0.19.0.
